column4: So i want to run skype, who can help me get my microphone working?
Can someone help me set up skype?
what do you need?
Well, seems audio output works, I need to get my microphone working
what kind of mic do you have?
3.5MM Jack going into the sound card, which the sound card is a VIA 8237
have you tried checking the settings in the volume control!? double click the speaker symbol at the top right
Yes, I have, I have also tried to record with audacity and only get tiny barly audable bits of what was recorded
run alsamixer from the command line
Yup looking at it
try turning the micboost option on
How, spacebar and return dont do anything?
two secs :[
try using the up arrow key!?
Nope, hasn't worked
sorry i'm not sure what else to suggest
How do we get skype working, seems such a nightmare to get working
i know what you mean - i've found using a usb mic works very well!
Can you suggest one?
i have a logitch
Plug and play job?
except you have to change the audio setting in skype
Alright well thanks anyway
